import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground } from 'docz';
import StatusInput from '../lib/status-input';

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"status-input"}}>{`Status Input`}</MDXTag>

<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"example"}}>{`Example`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={0} __code={'<StatusInput\n  name=\"status_input\"\n  id=\"status_input\"\n  actions={[\n    { label: \'picture\', icon: \'camera_alt\' },\n    { label: \'music\', icon: \'audiotrack\' },\n    { label: \'file\', icon: \'attach_file\' },\n  ]}\n/>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,StatusInput}}>
    <StatusInput
        name="status_input"
        id="status_input"
        actions={[
            { label: 'picture', icon: 'camera_alt' },
            { label: 'music', icon: 'audiotrack' },
            { label: 'file', icon: 'attach_file' }
        ]}
    >
</StatusInput>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"properties"}}>{`Properties`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Property`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Type`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Required?`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Default`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`id`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`String`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Yes`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`name`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`String`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Yes`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`className`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`String`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`No`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`''`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`submitLabel`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`String`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`No`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`''`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Placeholder`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`String`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`No`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`''`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`actions`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Array.<{icon, label, onClick}>`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`No`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`''`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
